comment.author: 18753752@N00
comment._content: This would be for the Meiji Emperor who died in 1912. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Meiji

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Date on negative is 9/9/12. He died on July 30, 1912. Funeral was in September. NYT article on September 8, 1912 [ query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9502E4DA113AE633A... ] shows the oxen being led through Tokyo streets to temporary housing before funeral. They had been brought from Kyoto.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the additional information!  We'll update the source data and reload the description.
